page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: A chicken farm in Akeley has recently started up, giving employment to a few women who sort and pack these free- range eggs for sale to top London shops such as Harrods. Stowe Castle Farm is all grassland used for animal feed. This enables the farmer to take long holidays without worrying about his crop. The main area left is cereal and oil seed rape, about 20% purely for grazing. Farmer's wives are all- important, they are up early preparing breakfast; their menfolk often come home for a cooked lunch with accompany- ing muddy footwear. Of course is they are large landowners they lead a very comfortable existence.
